Gaiabusters Functions

Function to perform gaiabusting.

class gaiabusters.DataTable(coord, radius='10 arcsec', source_table='gaiadr3.gaia_source')
__init__(coord, radius='10 arcsec', source_table='gaiadr3.gaia_source')

Initialize DataTable object to hold GAIA data information (+ other sources). Currently finds closest source to specified coordinates.

Parameters

  • coord (SkyCoord) – Coordinates of the target/field

  • radius (str, optional) – Search radius including units. Defaults to “10 arcsec”.

  • source_table (str, optional) – Which gaia source table to query. Can specify dr2, dr3, etc. Needs to be a source table. Defaults to “gaiadr3.gaia_source”.

get_epoch_photometry(verbose=False)

Retrieves epoch photometry data from Gaia Datalink service for current object.

Parameters

verbose (bool, optional) – Prints verbose statements. Defaults to False.

get_sdss()

Query SDSS for image of region surrounding ra, dec coords. This function uses mosaicking of plate images provided by reproject: https://reproject.readthedocs.io/en/stable/mosaicking.html Output image not advised for science, use at own peril.

plot_sdss()

Plot the SDSS image that was retrieved in this.get_sdss.

set_source_table(source_table)

Setting the source table variables with search output. (to do: have a list of available source tables and assert that specified table is in the list before continuing - display available source tables)

Parameters

source_table (str) – Name of the source table to be searched.
